.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/webloc.svg
    :target: https://pypi.org/pypi/webloc/

|

Install
```````


.. code:: bash

    `[sudo] pip install webloc`

Examples
````````


.. code:: bash

    $ webloc "$path" # get
    $ webloc "$path" "$url" # set
